unnormalised: Spill the Chai! Is Ranbir Kapoor caught in another *chakkar*? Sources close to the sets of his upcoming Dharma Productions film are whispering louder than Auntiji’s gossip circle at a Diwali party. Apparently, sparks are flying between RK and newcomer, Anya Sharma!
normalised: Spill the Chai! Is Ranbir Kapoor caught in another chakkar? Sources close to the sets of his upcoming Dharma Productions film are whispering louder than Auntiji's gossip circle at a Diwali party. Apparently, sparks are flying between R K and newcomer, Anya Sharma!

unnormalised: Anya, who hails from Delhi, is said to be quite the charmer. Our insider claims they’ve been spotted sharing *chai* breaks and giggling like teenagers. Remember his alleged fling during "Ae Dil Hai Mushkil"? Deja vu, anyone?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Alia Bhatt was seen solo at Ambani's bash last night. Just a coincidence? We think NOT!

unnormalised: Adding fuel to the fire, Anya recently posted an Instagram story quoting a famous dialogue from *Kuch Kuch Hota Hai*: "Pyaar Dosti Hai". Subtle, Anya, very subtle!
normalised: Adding fuel to the fire, Anya recently posted an Instagram story quoting a famous dialogue from Kuch Kuch Hota Hai: "Pyaar Dosti Hai". Subtle, Anya, very subtle!

unnormalised: Our Bollywood birdie also saw them leaving a rehearsal session together at Whistling Woods International, late last night. Hmmm...
